TopicTitle: The LIFE of a KSP Modder

Articles.Content: Know that not everyone uses my mod and I hope the forum moderators will take pity on me for cross posting this in my release thread as well, but I wanted to share with everyone just a brief glimpse of what your modders go through in order to bring you all the cool stuff you get to add to KSP.
You rock dude! Love the victory roll at the end too!

Don't tell me about the labor pains.

Just show me the baby.

(Just kidding, cool looking mod btw!)
